DOC.brief_summary: Adrenocortical carcinoma ( ACC ) rare heterogeneous malignancy poor prognosis . Surgical resection tumor treatment choice . However , even complete resection 80 % patient experience recurrence disease . Therefore , new treatment option urgently need . This pre-clinical study try lay foundation successful immunotherapy patient ACC .
DOC.brief_title: Preclinical Study Towards Immunotherapy Adrenocortical Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: patient histological proven adrenocortical carcinoma healthy person control group Life expectancy > 6 month autoimmune disease severe clinical condition
